CRMNEXT is the only complete financial services customer engagement solution; unifying the support of customer interactions, powerfully simplifying and automating processes, enabling the “universal banker” and managing differentiated interactions in every channel. CRMNEXT redefines the role of CRM in orchestrating engagement growth, profitability and time-to-market for innovation delivery.Currently empowering 1M bankers and serving 1B customers, this magic-quadrant leading customer engagement solution eliminates the artificial barriers between human and digital channels, enabling world class customer interaction from both self-service and assited-service channels in a powerful unified platform.

ustyme turns screen time into "us-time" as the first platform for content-centered-interaction. ustyme bridges the gaps in our time together with video calls that are content-centered using books, games and  other activities to create a rich social experience.  a change-the-world company and powerful platform that brings the world closer by combining video calling functionality like skype, with a content delivery platform that goes beyond kindle-like functionality to orchestrate cross-device content centered interactions in a way that is intuitive to users from 2 to 80 years of age. simple is hard to do, and requires a unique team, architecture and approach to be globally scalable across devices and content types. in addition to the platform development and operations teams, ustyme has a credentialed librarian and creative development team that has authored 35 books in English and Spanish, a game platform with classic games, and manages relationships with publishers that bring their books and games into the ustyme platform.ustyme accounts and calls are free, and are now used by families on 4 continents. every ustyme account is given 2 books and a game, and revenue from subsequent content purchases is shared with publishers

Sales Operations | Technical Sales | Sales Enablement
August 4, 2015, Joseph (Joe) managed Ed directly

Ed  was one of our key early hires that led the creation of our technical sales organization and was a  collaborative team player working with both our product and sales teams. He grew to lead the technical sales team and provide go-to-market analysis, competitive analysis, planning and execution to tenaciously meet, and frequently exceed our objectives.  Given his proximity to eastern prospects, when needed he filled the Sales role too. Ed can be counted on to do the work necessary to achieve success and is a dependable and versatile team leader / player with the highest integrity.  I would absolutely have Ed on my team again.

David Fenton
Senior Technical Writer
September 20, 2012, Joseph (Joe) was senior to David but didn’t manage directly

David was our first technical writer at ClairMail, and showed true talent.  He quickly identified what kind of documentation we needed and assembled it by forging great relationships with both engineering and product. Our documentation became a terrific asset for sales, customers and the product teams.. David assembled a documentation compendium that helped customers easily understand, purchase and use our products. For many companies,  salespeople hold off sharing documentation until the post-sales implementation and training process.  With David's skills and leadership at ClairMail our tech pubs were an asset early in the sales process and throughout the customer lifecycle.. David did this all with a sense of humor that helped with team morale and would be a great addition to any Tech Pubs department.

Eric Di Benedetto
Private Investor at Quadratura.it
January 28, 2008, Joseph (Joe) worked with Eric but at different companies

Eric is currently an investor in ClairMail and is an insightful partner in building our business. I have know Eric for 5 years, both at Active Starts and in his prior role at Convergence Partners. In both cases Eric lead the review and investment process, showing both a valued perspective on the business and an efficient ability to lead investments. As an early stage investor in ClairMail, Eric brought together a group of investors that have co-invested with him previously, and followed his investment in our company. He then helped facilitate the expanded group of early investors and assisted in the review of follow-on venture financing. In addition to his role in funding the company, Eric has provided terrific value and strategic insight into our business strategy.  It is noteworthy that people that invest with Eric are prior co-investors or prior investments. All share a respect for his integrity, insight and ability to help innovation grow into successful business
